Hi All,

When i try to remove the view of RibbonTab. I am getting follwing exception can any one help me on this.

Follwing code is used for adding and removing the RibbonTabs :

  protected override void Adapt(IRegion region, Ribbon regionTarget)
           {
               region.Views.CollectionChanged += (sender, e) =>
               {
                   switch (e.Action)
                   {
                       case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:
                           foreach (FrameworkElement element in e.NewItems)
                           {
                               regionTarget.Items.Add(element);
                           }
                           break;

                       case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:
                           foreach (UIElement elementLoopVariable in e.OldItems)
                           {
                               var element = elementLoopVariable;
                               if (regionTarget.Items.Contains(element))
                               {
                                   regionTarget.Items.Remove(element);
                               }
                           }
                           break;
                   }
               };
           }

when i try to remove the tab i am getting following exception :

" {"The region does not contain the specified view.\r\nParameter name: view"} "
